name: smart-buffer
description: smart-buffer is a Buffer wrapper that adds automatic read & write offset tracking, string operations, data insertions, and more.

scripts.prepublish: npm install -g typescript && npm run build
scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
